content:
Good morning, my name is Phil and I'm a team member over at DGNZ NFT. 

I wanted to extend the invitation to our second Web 3 Series of Poker event! We have over 30 communities already signed up, and there are some huge prizes to win including airpods, Oculus2, Macbooks, etc!

If you haven’t heard of us yet here's a brief summary of the first event:

https://twitter.com/W3SOP/status/1538921259018379266?s=20&t=qpBbOxVu7y723FvhGxVoLw 

Would love to have you guys participate in our second event, which is open for registration now!

Any questions feel free to just message me back. I would be happy to hop on a call 🙂

referenced_message.content: well, can someone explain to me what happened?
